FuncDef: This command creates a text description stored in the configuration file for a configuration context.

ParaDef.Info: A text string describing the entity. Allowed values are any string up to 80 printable, 7-bit ASCII characters. If the string contains special characters (#, $, spaces, and so on), the entire string must be enclosed within double quotes.

ExtraInfo: Default: No description is associated with the configuration context.
